story.title: Bedroomies - Episode 4
story.storyDescription: They're roommates who are never home at the same time. Let the flirty games begin...

author.bio: Chris Marie Green writes hot contemporary romance (like ‚ÄúBedroomies‚Äù!) plus urban fantasy. She also loves devouring pop culture and avoiding international incidents while traveling.

messages.text: Did you leave something on the sofa again?
Yup!
Well, it ain‚Äôt a toy, but I‚Äôll take the bottle of pinot. Thanks for thinking of me, Rosy.
It was the least I could do to thank you for the panties.
I‚Äôve got my own wine here in my hotel room. Lil bottles from the mini bar. So cute!
What‚Äôs the occasion?
Dunno. Just happy to have a job that lets me travel and meet with investors.
Best job evah!
And how much of that wine have you had?
Jenna looks at the one little bottle on the nightstand and drinks from the second.
I‚Äôm nicely buzzed but not out of my mind.
Are you texting because you miss me?
I suppose I do miss your cocky charm üòâ
All right. Let me pour myself a glass and you can tell me why you broke into the mini bar.
YES. We‚Äôre having a roomie talk! It‚Äôs almost like I‚Äôm there with you.
Not quite.
I know. But I can‚Äôt imagine what it‚Äôd be like to face you after what we started.
That‚Äôs not a reason to stop this though‚Ä¶right?
She puts down the bottle and nestles into the bed, the warm wine humming through her.
Is this a good time to tell him she‚Äôs wearing his gift panties?
Right. I‚Äôve decided to give you permission to do something you totally want to do.
Then we‚Äôre going to forget all about it. Okay?
This is surreal, but yes, okay.
But first ‚Äî are you sure you haven‚Äôt had too much wine?
Want me to recite the alphabet backward? Or walk you through all the decimals of pi?
Haha, in that case, I believe you.
Then here we go.
Didn‚Äôt you tell me that you wanted to see my notorious nightie?
Damn.
I believe that‚Äôs the caveman way of saying YES, I TOLD YOU THAT.
Thus, for one night only‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm allowing you to open my closed bedroom door to take a peek inside.
But ONLY at my lingerie drawer.
This offer has been gnawing away at her all day long.
She buries her face in the pillow, waiting for a response.
Which drawer is it?
You‚Äôre in my room already?
Like I‚Äôm going to wait?
It‚Äôs the middle drawer under the mirror.
DON‚ÄôT cheat and look anywhere else.
You know I‚Äôd never cheat on you, Rosy.
#Aw
Did you find the drawers?
What if I took this OUT of the drawer?
Um‚Ä¶
I want to hold it against my face so I can smell you.
Permission granted.
Damn, it smells amazing. Just like you.
Flowers. Your skin. Something else.
Oh‚Ä¶
Jenna slips her fingers under her shirt, touching her belly, then slides them down further.
She turns on Voice to Text‚Ä¶
Maybe you should describe what you‚Äôre imagining‚Ä¶
Okay. You‚Äôre wearing this nightie. I can see the hint of your curves under it.
Your breasts‚Ä¶your waist‚Ä¶your hips‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm on my knees in front of you and I lift up the chiffon‚Ä¶
Oh my God‚Ä¶
And then I have to taste you.
Yes you do.
Across the country, Jenna is actually moaning.
She‚Äôs imagining the moment too‚Ä¶
When you come, you nearly scream and melt against me‚Ä¶
But I catch you before you fall.
Jenna presses her face into the pillow.
Her cries get muffled until they become happy sighs.
You still there?
Barely. This a first.
What is?
Let‚Äôs just say I‚Äôve never been satisfied like that before.
Ever.
That‚Äôs because no one knows you like I do.
My sweet, nerdy, hellishly hot Jenna.
I always liked you the way you were, but damn, I‚Äôm liking you this way too.
I‚Äôm liking every version of you.
An emotional surge consumes her, and she sucks in another tense, liberating breath.
She lets it shudder out.
Wanna open up another drawer then tell me what you see?
Please tell me you have a cosplay drawer with corsets‚Ä¶
Second from the bottom.
I‚Äôm so digging this.
You watch Game of Thrones, huh?
Um yeah. You‚Äôd make the hottest Margaery imaginable.
But I want Jenna, not her.
OMG, you‚Äôre going to make me come again, aren‚Äôt you?
I can make you do that all night.
I‚Äôve already had my fun. I want YOU to do it now.
Look in my two top drawers. What do you see?
Sitting down on your bed now.
So this is what you keep hidden under those business suits.
Very hidden. No one else has ever seen these things but you.
Goddammit‚Ä¶
She sits up, imagining Adam‚Äôs green eyes full of heat and need.
Picture me in that bra and panties as I lean against the wall across the room.
Just so you know, my hands are gonna be busy here‚Ä¶
Good, because I‚Äôm slowly walking over to you as your gaze devours me.
I‚Äôm so hot tonight. It‚Äôs summer, and I need you to take these things off of me.
So I stand in front of you, letting you reach up to unhook my bra.
She brushes her fingers over her chest.
As you slide it off me, my breasts are exposed.
You slide your hands up my waist to cup them‚Ä¶
I reach down to your fly, and you‚Äôre ready for me.
I pump you up, then down, slowly at first, then faster, faster‚Ä¶
She pictures him doing the same, and she gets so damned hot.
And when you come, my name is on your lips.
Goddamn, Jen.
Tell me you changed your mind about coming back to your place before I leave tomorrow.
She almost types YES, but then only smiles wistfully.
Sweet dreams, Adam.
Because as sated as Jenna is, she panics for a moment‚Äî
Now Adam knows what‚Äôs in her drawers.
Taking a calming breath, she promises herself she‚Äôll never let him see what‚Äôs in her closet‚Ä¶
